This Android application uses a database that lists all the sports locations in the world. It thus allows the user to know where to go to practice the sport he has selected.

In order to retrieve the data, the client sends a GET request to the server, in the following form: https://sportplaces.api.decathlon.com/api/v1/places?origin=x&radius=y&sports=z with x: the user's current position. y: the search radius in km. z: the code identifying the indicated sport. Each sport is associated with a unique code.

Data URL: https://sportplaces.api.decathlon.com/api/v1/places

Cette application Android est le résultat d’un projet de cours de développement Android faisant partie de notre formation à l’Ecole Nationale des Mines de Saint-Etienne.\n\nLien du repository GitHub: https://github.com/ISMIN-Design-Of-Mobile-Application/open-data-android-app-AlexandreLadriere
